basicDescription: Throws 3 knives at enemies in a fan-shaped pattern
Spawns an area of dark matter that slows down and deal damage to enemies
Throws 1 projectile that bounces around before exploding
Stabs at enemies to deal damage, with a 10% chance of recovering 5% of health
Slams down a hammer charged with electricity to deal damage and stun enemies in front for 2 seconds
